decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, Preliminary floor plan, PL03 received  22/02/2017, SP01_VT received 18/04/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for B8 (storage and distribution) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times 07:30 - 18:00 on Mondays - Fridays and 07:30 - 13:00 on Saturdays. No activity shall take place on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 4 - The trade counter floorspace contained within the development hereby approved shall be used only as a trade counter ancillary to the main use of the premises as B8 (storage and distribution) and shall not be used for any other purpose.
description: Change of use from Classes B1/B2 (Office/General Industry) to Class B8 (Storage & Distribution) with Ancillary Trade Counter.
